head_text.subj: VIGNETTES OF CHILDREN AROUND THE WORLD

text: Children are waking up and realizing the Tooth Fairy never came. Lifting pillows and finding their BABY TEETH still there.

Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 55.
